nodes.bodyText: Can valid doc index be null if there are no more valid docs in that first segment? Or, is it guaranteed that this (potential optimization) will never happen

For now, the implementation guarantees all segments (immutable+mutable) of upsert table have non-null valid docs, while the segments of append-only table have null values.
But it's a good question that if we will use this valid doc for other purposes. By design, this valid doc is quite general and we may consider other types of ingestion-time filtering.
